Docs.summary: Changes that might occur to a file or directory.

remarks.format:
## Remarks Each WatcherChangeTypes member is associated with an event in <xref:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher>. For more information on the events, see <xref:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher.Created>, <xref:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher.Deleted>, <xref:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher.Changed>, and <xref:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher.Renamed>.
## Examples The following example shows how to create a FileSystemWatcher to monitor file changes (creates, deletes, renames, changes) occurring on a disk drive. The example also shows how to properly receive error notifications.
